content:
i received following email from the customer
Dear Eng. Khaled,

I hope you will be fine 

Kindly note:
- We have not yet received the marketing material needed to publish the IOS version. - Our 3 months support period will begin today, and we will provide assistance during this time.

About the support period your company didn’t deliver the full project until now and the last point’s we asked to fix it was delivered by your team at Thursday 16 February by the end of the working day .
And about testing the last APK you send I will start testing it today and give you our feedback as soon as possible
"
email ended

i need to tell the client that we are supporting him and we delivered complete android solution with backend 
and we asked for ios marketing materials but hte delay was from thier side 
also i want to check thier feedback about the latest released apk

can you write the email in profissional way also change the phrasing
